trans-unit.source: Contains classes that support interoperation of Windows Forms and WPF controls.
trans-unit.target: Contém classes compatíveis com interoperação de controles da WPF e Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration> namespace contains classes that enable interoperation between the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration> namespace contém classes que permitem interoperação entre o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] tecnologias.

trans-unit.source: When you use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration> classes, you can host [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controls on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] pages, and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elements in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based applications.
trans-unit.target: Quando você usa <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration> classes, você pode hospedar [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controles em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] páginas, e [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elementos no [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-com base em aplicativos.

trans-unit.source: The two key classes that implement interoperation capabilities are <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>.
trans-unit.target: As duas classes chave que implementam recursos de interoperabilidade são <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>.

trans-unit.source: Which class you use depends on your control implementation:
trans-unit.target: A classe usada depende de sua implementação de controle:

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control on a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] page.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> classe quando você deve usar um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control em um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] página.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based application.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> classe quando você deve usar um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento em um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-aplicativo com base em.
